column3: I also added a quick change to disable the forknotify rpc test, since it was causing some failures for windows as well. The reason for failure should obviously be investigated, but the current pull requests are a sea of red. Unless there are any objections, it'd be nice if this could go in asap to spare a good bit of confusion.\n

makes sense for me.
Obviously i can't test that.

ACK
Updated to use -j2 only for mingw (i hope). It may be possible once the cache is primed to compare future build times with historical ones, to glean the time difference between -j2 and -j3.\n
Ok, will merge once this passes Travis\n
